name: Noble Heir
description: Your family is known, whether for wealth, power, or infamy. Your bearing marks you as someone of importance.

feature.name: Noble Privilege
feature.description: You can secure audiences with other nobles and officials. Common people tend to defer to you, and you can leverage your family name for favors.

traits.text: I speak with confidence and authority.
I am gracious to those beneath my station.
I know the proper etiquette for every occasion.
I am unaccustomed to manual labor.
I carry myself with dignity at all times.
I am fascinated by common folk.
I drop my family name at every opportunity.

ideals.text: Responsibility. Nobility demands service to others.
Power. Strength is the right to rule.
Family. Blood is thicker than water.
Independence. I must prove myself outside my family's shadow.
Noble Obligation. I must protect those beneath me.
Tradition. The old ways preserve order.

bonds.text: I owe a debt to a commoner who helped me.
I will restore my family's fallen honor.
I carry a family heirloom of great value.
Someone in my family was wrongly accused.
My family has enemies I must face.

flaws.text: I am arrogant to a fault.
I hide a shameful family secret.
I look down on common people.
I am easily manipulated by flattery.
I believe I deserve special treatment always.
